channel.title: [OSRS] Vivid-OS - Join your next destiny | Perfect PvM & Pking
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/d90c285b61eeb4af7fc610b3e2759171.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img] Website - [URL=http://"http://vivid-os.com/"]www.vivid-os.com[/URL] (Still under work) [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/p9q8suozb86zbdj/Vivid-OS.jar"]Download Game Client[/URL] (1.4)
:lolbert:[B][COLOR=#d3d3d3][SIZE=2]Welcome[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]:penguin: [IMG]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2013/3/osr_-_fire_cape_ani-29233805.gif[/img] Vivid-OS is now released and we really want to you guys to enjoy very beginning of the server and see what has been done so far, but remember that the server will change alot as we progress, add new stuff and find bugs. We do want the players to report all bugs/glitches and report all faults immediately, as we don't want eco resets and what not.
[video=youtube;m7w0jMDyqO0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7w0jMDyqO0&feature=youtu.be[/video]
[video=youtube;xRPSpDKfAYU]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRPSpDKfAYU&feature=youtu.be[/video]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/ca1cf19330ec6c539d9ad60c5cd161aa.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/e0f6fc4142e8fe99c10cdd5485c2e572.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/432af2735e188fc3af83e510a69fdd1e.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/8b7eb9952f53e1442284a827b71a5c99.gif[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/9a88c71fca1f2b5b42e3638bf9095819.gif[/img]
[B]Well, what are you waiting for? Call your friends and have a nice time doing whatever you desire on Vivid-OS![/B][/CENTER]

[CENTER]

d90c285b61eeb4af7fc610b3e2759171.png696×173

Website - www.vivid-os.com (Still under work)
Download Game Client (1.4)

                                :lolbert:[B][COLOR=#d3d3d3][SIZE=2]Welcome[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]:penguin: [IMG]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2013/3/osr_-_fire_cape_ani-29233805.gif[/img]

Vivid-OS is now released and we really want to you guys to enjoy very beginning of the server and see what has
been done so far, but remember that the server will change alot as we progress, add new stuff and find bugs.
We do want the players to report all bugs/glitches and report all faults immediately, as we don’t want eco resets and what not.

[video=youtube;m7w0jMDyqO0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7w0jMDyqO0&feature=youtu.be[/video]

[video=youtube;xRPSpDKfAYU]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xRPSpDKfAYU&feature=youtu.be[/video]

432af2735e188fc3af83e510a69fdd1e.png761×499

8b7eb9952f53e1442284a827b71a5c99.gif728×466

Well, what are you waiting for? Call your friends and have a nice time doing whatever you desire on Vivid-OS![/CENTER]
